content.en: QoE Optimization: Researchers are exploring ways to improve the quality of experience (QoE) in mobile video streaming. They are using algorithms, such as deep Q-learning and reinforcement learning, to optimize rate adaptation, energy consumption, latency, fairness, and overall QoE. These algorithms are being applied in various contexts, including LTE networks, software-defined mobile networks, edge computing, and 5G networks, to enhance video streaming and communication services.
content.da: QoE-optimering: Forskere undersøger måder at forbedre kvaliteten af oplevelsen (QoE) i mobil videostreaming. De bruger algoritmer, såsom deep Q-learning og reinforcement learning, til at optimere hastighedstilpasning, energiforbrug, latenstid, retfærdighed og den samlede QoE. Disse algoritmer anvendes i forskellige sammenhænge, herunder LTE-netværk, software-definerede mobilnetværk, edge computing og 5G-netværk, for at forbedre videostreaming og kommunikationstjenester.
